| The aim of the environmental monitoring programme is to identify any potential risks in the production and packaging material so that it can be appropriately managed and prevented from becoming the source of product contamination (which could lead to non-conforming product, a customer complaint or other incidents). | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| Nature of the Product: The product is packaging material aimed for food and beverage market. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| Hand / Product Swab Results : Annual microbiological swab results were reviewed and found within specification confirming Cleaning and Sanitation Procedures in place are effective. Water Results not within specification. Re test done await results. Refresher traning done for cleaning. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |

| Low | If the consequences to this activity is LOW, it is okay to continue with exisiting microbial swabbing to ensure that cleaning practices are effective. These will be done as per Monitoring Plan. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| Medium | If the consequences to this activity is MEDIUM, Target organisms will be analysed for bacteria. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| High | If the consequences to this activity is HIGH, products will be placed on hold until that state of production/raw materials can be brought into compliance. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
